products - DLP range

The DLP high-capacity load cell pin

DLP Load Pins

Load pins are one of the most resilient yet simple load measurement devices,
designed primarily to replace conventional pins in cranes and winches, they are
suitable for new or retrofit applications in a range of industries from
offshore winches to crane load measurement.

rugged | High Accuracy | Compact
Key Features

DLP

  • Capacities (t): 
    250kg to 5000t
  • Stainless Steel Construction (17-4PH H1150)
  • Bespoke Dimensions.
  • Internally down-hole gauged
  • High impact & overload capability.
  • IP67 rating (IP68 & Subsea options)
  • Rationalised mV output / 4-20mA / RS485
  • Wireless 2.4GHz or Wired with Connector/Gland
  • Temperature & Environmental Compensation
  • Dual redundant gauged
  • Dual axis X-Y gauged
Typical. applications

DLP

  • Winch Tension Measurement
  • Anchor packages
  • Chain Stopper Systems.
  • Crane Load Measurement
  • Mooring Load Measurement
  • Grab & Grapple Systems.
  • Wheel Pins
